title: Chaotic Presence (+Hard, Requires a Gang)
description: When you and your gang enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Hard.

bullets: Someone in your gang picks a fight with someone here. Ask the MC who and what it's about.
Someone here owes something to someone in your gang. Ask the MC who and how serious it is.
Someone in your gang wants to help or save someone here. Ask the MC who and how far they'll go.
Someone here has a loyalty-testing connection with someone in your gang. Ask the MC who and how they act on it.
Someone here is so afraid of someone in your gang that they abruptly leave. Ask the MC who.
Someone here makes a huge show of welcome to someone in your gang. Ask the MC who and whether it's sincere.

outcomes.text: The MC chooses 1 for you, and you can choose another if you like:
Ask the MC what [your most dumbass] does.

title: Battle-skilled
description: When you **attack** or **do battle**, on any hit, you get +1choice.

title: Hunter-killers (Requires a Gang)
description: Your gang carries portable rocket tubes instead (4-harm, close/far, concentrated fire, braced, total ammo: 6).

title: Scavengers & Thieves (+Hard, Requires a Gang)
description: When something's hard to come by, even impossible to come by, or not available in any convenient market, have your gang search its panniers and saddlebags. Roll+Hard.

outcomes.text: You've got just the thing, or better.
You've got just the thing, more or less.
Somebody robbed you, or someone in your gang is holding out.

title: Skirmishers (Requires a Gang)
description: Your gang has the experience, discipline, and mobility to take on a much larger gang. When you're outnumbered in battle, count your gang as twice its number.

title: Gear
description: You get the same ride, weapons, and armor your pack has.

title: Improvements
description: You get **chaotic presence**, and choose 1 more Harrier move.. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get a garage (workspace: vehicles) and tinkering
Get a move from an unused playbook
Get a move from an unused playbook
